import React, { useState } from 'react' import './navbar.css' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../assets/cart_icon.png' export const Navbar = () => { const [menu,setMenu] = useState("Shop"); const [selected,doSelected]=useState(false) const selectedMenu=(e)=>{ setMenu("e.target.outerText"); doSelected(true) } return (
